body: i wonder why the most shota tagged mangas with english translation has to be yaoi, seriously i have so many straight shota mangas that i want to read but i cant since i dont understand chinese or japanese (yet), to be honest i already tryed to translate some of them but, u know, 2 problems: 1 is that we cant count with google translations, and 2 its kinda hard when u have one hand translating and the other fapping and scrolling the pages at the same time  :|
oh wow, the succubi from the other doujin made a cameo here. neat.
